size to meet gauge **notations ** removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 and make french knots scissors 5 blocking mat & pins **yarn ** wecrochet palette 6 100% peruvian highland wool 231yds/50g colorways cream 1 ball 190 yds blush 2 balls 325 yds tea rose 2 balls 400 yds victorian 3 balls 575 yds total yardage 1490 yds **yardage ** total yardage 1490 yds 8 total balls of yarn **abbreviations** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet st s - stitch es **gauge ** 21 sts x 13 row = 4x4 inches in double_crochet unblocked 19 sts x 12 row = 4x4 inches blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 7 **skill level ** easy beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www
